flowtrend 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Makes 1d plot of data when

plot_1d_with_membership.Rd

Makes 1d plot of data when

Usage

plot_1d_with_membership(
  ylist,
  memlist,
  countslist = NULL,
  x = NULL,
  alpha = 0.01
)

Arguments

ylist

Particlel-level data. A list of (|nt| by |dimdat|) matrices.

memlist

List of memberships for the particles.

x

Time points. Defaults to NULL.

alpha

Between 0 and 1, how transparent to plot the data points. Defaults to 0.1.

Value

ggplot object with data, and optionally, a flowtrend model overlaid.

On this page
